title: Pong(1986)
description:
Directed by: Lee Doo-yong
Screenwriter: Do-hyang Na / Sam-yuk Yoon
Starring: Lee Mi Sook / Lee large root
Genre: Drama
Producer Country / Region: South Korea
Language: Korean
Release date: 1986-02-08
Also known as: Pong / Mulberry
IMDb link: tt0271121

An Xuan Shuo is the most beautiful village beauty, just like her husband, Kim gambling, but do not go back home several times a year, he made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹money spent on security in order to give workers Mulberry benevolence, the village men and women are very like to talk to her. Because life is too hard, despite safety conscience, but she decided to go with the body in exchange for money. The matter was a woman who knew the village, the village elders announced to her out of the village to go, but in front of her charms, we still could not do it, have bowed in front of her. For this to limit her words, security is also to be understood simply do not, which makes Jin Delu angry exception, out of revenge, and ran in front of Kim Bo told everything, Kim Bo heard furious, he beat Jin Delu, and asked his wife to go back, when informed that this is all for him, he forgave security, and leave the village moved to the city. In fact, Kim Bo's true identity is an anti-Japanese elements, a young Japanese military police are tracking him.
The story takes place in the 1920s, the film was shooting in a Japanese army occupied Korea was a small village. Is a description of a young wife and several men in contact, which may also represent the Korean nation was exuberant vitality. Story describes how the villagers fight against poverty, and they have their own understanding of life and efforts, the face of Japanese occupation Earl, they brave, stick to their national faith. Directed by Lee Doo-yong is the backbone of Korean director, this work is his 80s in Korea under the impact of the new movie, to "writer movie" one of the representatives, the film was screened in Japan, too.
